data.comment: The big names in today's match at Neftyanik Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Corner awarded to Ufa.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 2, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ufa to check on Denis Hadzikadunic, who is grimacing with pain.
Rostov's Denis Hadzikadunic is back in action after a slight knock.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ufa.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 11, Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Ufa's area.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Free kick Ufa.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Rostov in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 16, Ufa have a dangerous throw-in.
Ufa's Timur Zhamaletdinov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rostov defender.
Can Ufa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rostov's half?
In the minute 18, Eldor Shomurodov (Rostov) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Throw-in Rostov.
Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Mikhail Vilkov signals a Rostov throw-in in Ufa's half.
Ufa's Artem Golubev has run offside.
Throw-in for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 24, Khoren Bayramyan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rostov.
Ufa have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Ufa are pushing forward but Artem Golubev's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Rostov have a goal kick.
Rostov to take a throw-in in Ufa territory.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 29, Rostov pushes forward through Danil Glebov, whose finish on goal is saved.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Ufa throw-in in Rostov's half.
Throw-in for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 31, Rostov push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Alexey Ionov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ufa defence.
Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov.
In the minute 34, Throw-in Ufa.
Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 39, Vyacheslav Krotov (Ufa) has been sent off!
Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Rostov in Ufa.
In Ufa, Baktiyor Zaynutdinov of Rostov is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Mikhail Vilkov awards the home team a throw-in.
Rostov's Eldor Shomurodov is on target but unsuccessful.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Rostov.
In Ufa Rostov attack through Khoren Bayramyan. The finish is off target, however.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Ufa a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Neftyanik Stadium.
The second half has started at Neftyanik Stadium.
The home team replace Artem Golubev with Olivier Thill.
In the minute 47, Can Rostov capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ufa's half?
Mathias Normann of Rostov gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ufa goal kick.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Rostov at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ufa needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Ufa's area.
In the minute 50, Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 51, Timur Zhamaletdinov of Ufa is pulled up for offside.
Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 53, Ufa to take a throw-in in Rostov territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Throw-in for Rostov at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 55, Rostov advance rapidly upfield but Mikhail Vilkov blows for offside.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 57, Ufa needs to be cautious. Rostov have an attacking throw-in.
Important block from the Ufa defence as Mathias Normann fires in a strike for Rostov.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in Ufa.
Ufa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Rostov get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ufa's half?
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Ufa in their own half.
Free kick Rostov.
Ufa have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Ufa in their own half.
Throw-in for Rostov close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Valeri Karpin (Rostov) is making a first substitution, with Pavel Mamaev replacing Mathias Normann.
In the minute 65, Rostov push forward at Neftyanik Stadium and Aleksey Kozlov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ufa defence.
Dmitri Poloz is replacing Alexey Ionov for the away team.
The home team have replaced Timur Zhamaletdinov with Gamid Agalarov. This is the second substitution made today by Vadim Evseev.
Rostov have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Free kick for Ufa in the half of Rostov.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Rostov is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ufa.
Throw-in for Rostov in the half of Ufa.
In the minute 68, Rostov have a dangerous throw-in.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Rostov, close to Ufa's area.
Rostov awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ufa.
In Ufa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Ufa, Ionut Nedelcearu (Ufa) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 71, Can Ufa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rostov's half?
In Ufa, Pavel Mamaev of Rostov is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rostov's Dmitri Poloz breaks free at Neftyanik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, Ufa have a goal kick.
Dmitri Poloz for Rostov gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Ufa at Neftyanik Stadium.
Ball safe as Ufa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Ufa make their third substitution with Igor Bezdenezhnykh replacing Oleg Danchenko.
Free kick Ufa.
Rostov awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 77, Catalin Carp (Ufa) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Pavel Mamaev (Rostov) strikes at Neftyanik Stadium but his header is cleared.
Gamid Agalarov is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Rostov in their own half.
Kento Hashimoto scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 79, Pavel Mamaev instrumental with a fine assist.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ufa just outside Rostov's area.
Khoren Bayramyan (Rostov) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 83, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov in their own half.
Lovro Bizjak is on a sub for Catalin Carp for Ufa.
Evgeni Chernov is replacing Baktiyor Zaynutdinov for Rostov at Neftyanik Stadium.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Rostov.
Rostov drives forward and Khoren Bayramyan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rostov drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 88, Ufa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Ufa in Ufa.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Rostov a goal kick.
Rostov needs to be cautious. Ufa have an attacking throw-in.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Ufa close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Rostov at Neftyanik Stadium.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Rostov.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Valeri Karpin is making the team's fourth substitution at Neftyanik Stadium with David Tosevski replacing Eldor Shomurodov.
Evgeni Chernov for Rostov has been booked by Mikhail Vilkov and receives a first yellow card.
